prediction.overall_explanation: The contract is a standard ERC20 token implementation with minting controlled by a trusted minter role. No exploitable vulnerabilities exist: all functions use safe arithmetic (Solidity 0.8+), standard checks (balances, allowances), and no reentrancy risks. Unlimited minting and minter changes are intentional design choices relying on trusted roles, not vulnerabilities. No concrete attack paths without compromising the minter.
